description: Lists the findings (results) of a Device Defender audit or of the audits performed during a specified time period. (Findings are retained for 90 days.) Requires permission to access the ListAuditFindings action.

parameters.name: resourceIdentifier
parameters.description: Information identifying the noncompliant resource. deviceCertificateId (string) --- The ID of the certificate attached to the resource. caCertificateId (string) --- The ID of the CA certificate used to authorize the certificate. cognitoIdentityPoolId (string) --- The ID of the Amazon Cognito identity pool. clientId (string) --- The client ID. policyVersionIdentifier (dict) --- The version of the policy associated with the resource. policyName (string) --- The name of the policy. policyVersionId (string) --- The ID of the version of the policy associated with the resource. account (string) --- The account with which the resource is associated. iamRoleArn (string) --- The ARN of the IAM role that has overly permissive actions. roleAliasArn (string) --- The ARN of the role alias that has overly permissive actions. issuerCertificateIdentifier (dict) --- The issuer certificate identifier. issuerCertificateSubject (string) --- The subject of the issuer certificate. issuerId (string) --- The issuer ID. issuerCertificateSerialNumber (string) --- The issuer certificate serial number. deviceCertificateArn (string) --- The ARN of the identified device certificate.

nested_params.name: deviceCertificateId
nested_params.description: The ID of the certificate attached to the resource.

nested_params.name: caCertificateId
nested_params.description: The ID of the CA certificate used to authorize the certificate.

nested_params.name: cognitoIdentityPoolId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Amazon Cognito identity pool.

nested_params.description: The version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_params.name: policyVersionId
nested_params.description: The ID of the version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_params.name: account
nested_params.description: The account with which the resource is associated.

nested_params.name: iamRoleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IAM role that has overly permissive actions.

nested_params.name: roleAliasArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the role alias that has overly permissive actions.

nested_params.name: issuerCertificateSubject
nested_params.description: The subject of the issuer certificate.

nested_params.name: deviceCertificateArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the identified device certificate.

nested_items.name: findings
nested_items.description: The findings (results) of the audit.

nested_items.name: findingId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for this set of audit findings. This identifier is used to apply mitigation tasks to one or more sets of findings.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the audit that generated this result (finding).

nested_items.name: checkName
nested_items.description: The audit check that generated this result.

nested_items.name: taskStartTime
nested_items.description: The time the audit started.

nested_items.name: findingTime
nested_items.description: The time the result (finding) was discovered.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the result (finding).

nested_items.name: nonCompliantResource
nested_items.description: The resource that was found to be noncompliant with the audit check.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the noncompliant resource.

nested_items.name: resourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: Information that identifies the noncompliant resource.

nested_items.description: The ID of the CA certificate used to authorize the certificate.

nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Cognito identity pool.

nested_items.name: clientId
nested_items.description: The client ID.

nested_items.name: policyVersionIdentifier
nested_items.description: The version of the policy associated with the resource.

nested_items.description: The ARN of the identified device certificate.

nested_items.name: reasonForNonCompliance
nested_items.description: The reason the resource was noncompliant.

nested_items.name: reasonForNonComplianceCode
nested_items.description: A code that indicates the reason that the resource was noncompliant.

nested_items.name: isSuppressed
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the audit finding was suppressed or not during reporting.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
